element.definition: Client is visiting for the recommended 3-month pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) visit
element.comment: There are specific indicators that reference the 3-month PrEP visit, so it is included separately here. If there are cutoffs for what can be considered a 3-month visit, they should be added.
